nodes.text: EA Digital Illusions Creative Entertainment AB (commonly shortened as EA DICE or DICE) is a video game development company founded in 1992 and located in Stockholm, Sweden. The company is responsible for the creation of the first Star Wars Battlefront in the reboot series and the sequel Star Wars Battlefront II.

On June 10, 2013, EA announced that DICE would be the developers behind Star Wars Battlefront, a new game part of the Battlefront series started by Pandemic Studios. The game released on November 16, 2015. 6 downloadable content packs were relased over the game's lifespan, those being:
